sentences.en: A sniper who doesn't relocate isn't normal.
sentences.cn: 狙击手不改变自己的位置是很不正常的.

sentences.en: All right. Can you relocate if you're hired by us?
sentences.cn: 我明白了. 如果我们录用你的话,你能搬过来 吗 ?

sentences.en: David: Yes, I wondered if I would be expected to relocate.
sentences.cn: 大卫: 有的, 我想知道我是否有可能被派驻到其他地方.

sentences.en: Employees are reimbursed for any legal fees incurred when they relocate.
sentences.cn: 员工调往异地工作时,他们可以报销由此产生的所有法律服务费用.

sentences.en: If the company was to relocate, most employees would move.
sentences.cn: 如果这个公司要搬迁，多数员工也要搬家。

sentences.en: Relocate photocopiers , which produce ozone, away from the general work area.
sentences.cn: 把会产生臭氧的影印机设置在远离一般工作的地点.

sentences.en: Simonson's team expected to relocate the body during their high level search.
sentences.cn: 西门松的探险队员们期望在高地段搜寻时再找到那具尸体.

sentences.en: Since you don't want to relocate your WC, just abort this dialog.
sentences.cn: 当然你不是想重定位你的工作拷贝, 取消这个对话框就行了.

sentences.en: Take steps to correct these hazards - secure or relocate heavy items as appropriate.
sentences.cn: 请设法逐个排除这些隐患,妥善安置各种重物,把不妥的重物重新放置.

sentences.en: The firm may be forced to relocate from New York to Stanford.
sentences.cn: 公司也许会被迫从纽约迁移到斯坦福。

sentences.en: The management decided to relocate the factory in Bristol.
sentences.cn: 资方决定将工厂建在布瑞斯托尔.

sentences.en: To pause to relocate a scent . Used of hunting dogs.
sentences.cn: 指猎犬停顿一下来重新辨别气味的方位.

sentences.en: We had to relocate the office because the rent was too high.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不转移办公室,因为租金太贵.

sentences.en: Will you have to travel or relocate for your job?
sentences.cn: 为了工作你会经常出差或者搬家 么 ?

sentences.en: You can relocate anywhere if you can get off this globe.
sentences.cn: 你可以重新部署任何地方如果我们能够离开这个星球的话.

words.tran_cn: 重新安置；再布置，变换布置

trans.tran_en: if a person or business relocates, or if they are relocated, they move to a different place
